Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

“The numbskulls at Terratech thought to use these beetle creatures as beasts of burden for low-tech colonization. Fools! Their specimens were juveniles! These profit-driven middle-managers moved to market so fast, and with so little scientific oversight; they’d infested hundreds of worlds with insectoid juggernaut offspring before realizing their mistake. All because anything that’s alien sells. You can’t just file off a creature’s mandibles and change its nature. The beetle pupae still explode if they die. And what happens when Beetle Baby becomes Beetle Adult?” —Professor R. Lin’l “Bugman” Bunson, “RV-181S: Seti Alpha Outpost Recordings”

“泰拉科技那群蠢货想用这些甲虫生物作为低科技含量殖民地化的驮兽。真的愚蠢！他们用的样本只是幼虫而已！这些利益攻心的中层管理者只想着快速占领市场，一点科研的眼光都不具备；直到他们给几百个星球都埋下了这些类昆虫大家伙的幼崽之后，才意识到自己犯下了错误。全都是因为外星销售。把某个生物的下颚给割掉并不能改变它的本性。这种甲虫的蛹死后仍然会爆炸。况且，当这些甲虫宝宝长成了成虫之后会发生什么？”- R.林“昆虫人”邦森教授，“RV-181S：赛提阿尔法星前哨记录”

“Little Derek Hampton loved his Beetle Baby, Bulby. He cried the night Bulby went to sleep and grew a hard-shell cocoon. The man who sold Derek his beloved pet told him to return Bulby if it ever did this, but Derek didn’t have the heart. He hid Bulby from the colony. Despite all the warnings that Bulby would turn into a terrible monster with huge mandibles that could bite through walls and spit globs of deadly venom, Derek believed Bulby would still be his beloved friend. [br/]He was wrong. Everyone died.”—Terratech PR Galactic, “RV-9504A: Don’t be a Derek”

“小德里克·哈普顿曾经很喜欢他的甲虫幼虫布尔比。有一天晚上，当布尔比睡觉的时候变成了一个硬邦邦的茧，德里克伤心地哭了。将布尔比卖给德里克的那个男人告诉他，如果有一天布尔比变成了这样，一定要将它送回来。但德里克不忍心这么做，他将布尔比藏了起来。尽管大家都告诉警告过他，布尔比将会变成一只可怕的怪兽，拥有能够咬穿墙壁的下颚，还会喷吐出致命的毒液，但德里克依然相信布尔比将会是他最好的朋友。[br/]然而他错了，所有人都死了。”- 泰拉科技银河公关，“RV-9504A：不要成为德里克”
